channel.title: design-thinking on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in design-thinking on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: What I Learned On Design Thinking And Software Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I’m Huyen Le - newcomer of Dwarves Foundation. Last week, I was taught under the instruction of Khai Le about design thinking and how it works in a design process of a software project.

item.title: Six Things I Extracted From Design Thinking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I’m Minh Truong, I’ve been working as a UI/UX Design for 2 years. I’m currently part of the Dwarves Foundation team.
